title: Stock futures fall after Trump says tariffs will go into effect on Aug. 1, not July 9: Live updates - CNBC
description: Stock futures fall after Trump says tariffs will go into effect on Aug. 1, not July 9: Live updates  CNBCTrump confirms ‘letter or a deal’ by July 9.
